title: Am I allowed to main ad bard mid?
body: Recently I have been maining ad bard mid on normals and I found him to be much more fun to play him ad mid than any other champion followed by ad soraka mid. I heard that a plat singed support was banned for this behavior, but as far as I know, this doesn't go against the rules. Am I going to be allowed to main ad bard mid?

replies.body: As long as you aren't trolling your games and legit trying new strategies, I don't see why it would be against any rules.

Of course with the autoban system with so many reports, if enough players report you simply becasue they don't understand then bye bye. Honestly the report feature of the game is broken and while it does work on some cases others players trying new things get banned for it. Honestly I'm surprised they can't sue for loss of an account that was unfairly banned.

> Of course with the autoban system with so many reports, if enough players report you simply becasue they don't understand then bye bye. Honestly the report feature of the game is broken and while it does work on some cases others players trying new things get banned for it.

Not even in the slightest. That is not how the system works at all. If that were the case, then the [PB](http://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-behavior-moderation) board would be filled with players who were banned like this.

>  I'm surprised they can't sue for loss of an account that was unfairly banned.

You can't sue for the loss of something you didn't own in the first place. Read the [ToU](http://na.leagueoflegends.com/en/legal/termsofuse), which you agreed to when you began playing (and every change of it thereafter).
Thanks for the feedback guys! I'll try not to feed ;)

As my summoner indicates i do the same as you (just the other way around). If you dont end up feeding which i guess you dont otherwise you wouldnt try, i dont think there is a problem. Youll probably get flamed in champ select, especially in ranked. But since i changed my name to Taliyah supp and had a decent winrate (back in the day) nobody flamed me anymore. So yeah, just make sure noone tillts in champ select and you are good to go :)
